attributes.action: Use his Scottish influence to persuade JK Rowling to write at least on more book. this is in the interest of the nation & worldwide relations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a bookto fill in the space between the last book & the jump to their adulthood. This would help the export trade of Britain & give the young members of the nation something to look forward to.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
